backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, owner authentication, menu CRUD, orders, and shop settings with access control and blob storage mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for customer and owner areas within ThemeProvider and CartProvider.
frontend/src/components/brand/ShopLogo.t: Displays shop logo from settings or fallback image with adjustable sizes.
frontend/src/components/customer/OffersP: Renders grid of special offers from local offer state or hides when none exist.
frontend/src/components/guards/OwnerGuar: Protects owner routes by checking authentication and redirecting or showing an access denied card.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation for customer/owner areas, mobile menu, and notification badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderNotifications: Tracks new orders for shop owners and triggers audio and browser notifications when new orders appear.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor functions such as menu CRUD, orders, and shop settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines custom light/dark theme color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.

frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Handles checkout flow with validation, places orders via mutation, and shows success or redirects if cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MenuPage.tsx: Fetches and displays menu items with loading skeletons, separating available and unavailable items, and allows adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login landing page offering customer and shop owner login paths with styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/owner/admin/AdminMenu: Admin interface to list, add, edit, and delete menu items using CRUD mutations with a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/owner/admin/AdminOffe: Admin page for managing offers, supporting create, update, and delete actions through a dialog-driven form.
frontend/src/pages/owner/admin/AdminOrde: Renders the admin orders dashboard, fetching orders, sorting them, displaying status badges, and allowing status updates with notifications.
frontend/src/pages/owner/admin/AdminSett: Displays and updates shop settings including name and logo, handling file uploads, validation, and persistence.

frontend/src/state/offers.ts: Implements a hook for managing promotional offers with localStorage persistence and CRUD operations.
frontend/src/state/ownerAuth.ts: Handles simple owner authentication state using sessionStorage with set, check, and clear functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, plugins, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, issues, and configuration for project management tooling.
